shortDescription: The Lin Kuei cryomancer of legend.

dialogues.message: Don't distract me from my mission.
Are you an ally of the Lin Kuei?
Scorpion... I must find him.
Don't distract me from my mission.
Victors write history, and I do not lose.
What is it that you seek?
The Tournament was created by the Elder Gods to suppress the Outworld threat.
It is held once per generation...
...and it cannot be refused.
If you are chosen to fight for this realm... will you be ready?

shortDescription: He's kind of a Big Dill.

dialogues.message: Stay salty.
Name's Big Dill.
Stay salty.
I've got that fermentation elation!
This gherk's got the gold.
There's my Boi!
What's in the jar, bro? WHAT'S IN THE JAR?!
Respectfully, your flow is absolutely rancid.
Free your brain from the brine, and speak up.
Why choose just one when you can have two?
I'm the innovator of the Pump & Dump.
Load 'em up with the SMG, then knock 'em down.
In the studio I go by Big Dill.
Outside of the studio, I also go by Big Dill.
Just call me Big Dill. It's easier that way.
It's the scam--um, *business* of the future, man.
You give me Bars. I have your Bars. I spend your Bars.
And you get to have a Dill Bit!
And you get to attempt to spend it however you want. No refunds.
What do you want to know?
Chasing the Shard with Jones has gotten me thinking about how it all started.
I was just some girl trying to fix the world, with the odds against her.
I was scared and over my head, and couldn't ever show it.
Jones took me under his wing. If I met someone like me... I'd like to do that, too.
I never met anyone back home who really 'got' me.
Jones is a great mentor, and we're a great team, but Kendo is different.
Kendo's quiet, and sensitive, and knows what it's like to have a hyper-ambitious older sibling.
He always has my back. I hope he knows I have his back, too.
The Shard seems to be locked away in the Spirit Realm.
Fun fact: Only demons can use the portals, which is... great.
And even if we could get through, it's swarming with enemies.
We need to figure out a plan. And soon.
Haven't seen this many people obsessed with gold since The Society.
Good to see you again.
Haven't seen this many people obsessed with gold since The Society.
Geez. This Island has gotten... chaotic.
Crime, gold, power struggles... Reminds me of home. Ugh.
Making slow progress on securing the Shard. We NEED a plan.
We need a way to breach the Spirit Realm if we want to secure the Shard.
I'd really love for us to be allies... if you're willing to give up the Shard.
Your brother will turn up. Hopefully without any schemes in play.
You're the only one I know who can understand what the Sprites say...
Welcome to the team. Tell me everything you know about the Spirit Realm.
Your gold-fingered boss. What can you tell me about him?

shortDescription: A wandering r≈çnin with a restless spirit.

dialogues.message: This Island is special. It needs protection.
My blade's at your service.
This Island is special. It needs protection.
My family is supposed to protect this Island. Not destroy it.
Crime, chaos... I don't recognize the Island I love anymore.
I will rid this Island of the demons that menace it.
I know you're planning something foolish, brother. Don't.
I think Daigo's working on one of his... projects.
Sometimes I feel like nobody on this Island gets me, except you.
You got your freedom. What comes next?
I promise, I've got Hope's back. And I know she has mine.
We should spar sometime. Curious to see how that'd go.
How can you not believe in magic?? It's all around you.
How can I help?
I love my family, but I never feel totally relaxed around them.
Hope is different. We just... get each other.
She always has my back. And I have hers. That's a new feeling.
I hope she feels the same way.
You know that feeling you get sometimes, like you're being watched?
I get that feeling every time Daigo's got a new 'project'. Like a sixth sense.
Daigo's projects are always big, bold, and leave a huge mess for the rest of us.
I hope I'm wrong. But I know I'm not.
Jade's home, and everything is... mostly... back to normal.
She's lost some of her recklessness. I thought I'd be relieved, but...
Still, she's exploring her connection to the sprites, and that's beautiful.
I think she's found her destiny. I'm proud, if a little jealous.
Got questions? Hit me.
No risk, no reward baby.
And no cool story to impress people with afterwards, either.
Sometimes risking it all is scary, but you can do anything scared.
And whatever happens, you're a little less scared to do it next time.
That arrogant, pompous, TACKY pomeranian...
He thinks he can rule with an iron paw.
But when tyranny bites... we bite back.
When we're through with him, he'll run cryin' back to his kennel.
He's a legend. Literally. I can't believe he's real.
When I was a kid, I dreamt of working with him...
The ultimate criminal. And me, his protege.
...Sorry, I got distracted. What did you want?
I'm all in.
Cassidy Quinn, at your disservice.
I'm all in.
Has fate dealt you a good hand today?
Some people call me the Quinn of Spades. You know, when I ask them to.
Whatever you're planning, deal me in.
I'll slow down when I'm good and ready for it.
You're... Midas!! THE Midas!! Oh... Oh wow....
You're not gonna catch me.
Go 'head. I don't bite.
Why are you askin' 'bout my mamma?
YOU BEST SPEAK CAREFULLY, NOW.
THAT'S WHAT I THOUGHT.
I am RETIRED! ish.
Sure, 'ccasionally I come outta retirement for fun. Heh.
But generally speakin', I'm outta the crime game.
Only good, honest illegal explosives manufacturing for this possum!
What's there to say, except I love 'em?
The smell, the danger, the raw throwability...
Nothin' else compares to a great big KABOOM!
If it ain't my favorite Ratso! Back for more?
Get yer explosives, destructives, and all manner of grenade-u-lators!!
KABOOM!
Short fuse, long fuse, no fuse... whatever you want as long as it 'splodes!
Today, I'm retired. Ask again tomorrow.
Yer house'd look much prettier as a pile'a charred rubble.
Whatever yer plannin', it needs more explosives!

shortDescription: Get in, get the goods, and get out with style.

dialogues.message: Don't waste my time. What do you need?
Hey.
Don't waste my time. What do you need?
The world's got a rhythm. Pay attention to it, and you can get anywhere.
I can crack any safe on this Island. Just watch me.
Cassidy Quinn. Always a sight for sore eyes.
I like your beats. Your bars are a little... briny.
Your security's a joke, Kane. And not even a funny one.
Your girl Quinn came 'round. You two still runnin' together?
Skillet! How're the booms?
You've got questions? Hit me.
Crime is like a dance.
A bank job is a ballet: carefully choreographed, everyone in their role. Tense, beautiful.
Safecracking is a bachata: intimate, sensual, dangerous.
Robbing Kane is like a school dance: embarassingly easy if you've got any rhythm.
I can't promise I'll answer.
We're... old acquaintances. And yes, he's always been a pompous blowhard.
Even when "The Baron" had nothing, he believed the world belonged to him.
I've always been one step ahead of him. And I suspect he's taken that personally over the years.
Ah, well. It can't be helped. Robber kings can either be the best or yield to the best. And Kane will yield.
Oh, it's not altruism, believe me. These people can decide what's best for them just fine.
And these criminals don't want to be governed. Least of all by me.
But we have a singular aligned goal: get Kane out of everyone's way.
It's a tenuous, temporary alliance. But if we can pull this off, everyone wins. Isn't that nice?
They've been calling me the Golden Gunslinger. I... think I like it.
Did you miss me?
They've been calling me the Golden Gunslinger. I... think I like it.
I suppose they call it "Crime City" for a reason.
Yes?
You're looking at me like you know I'm up to something.
Have you been telling people you're my protege? That's... bold.
I meant to write. I'm sorry.
I'm so grateful for your loyalty, old friend.
(Midas scritches your ears affectionately.)
I don't know another woman across reality who'd break me out of the Underworld like you did.
I sense a question bubbling up...
I think magic is just science we don't understand yet.
We used to think miasmas caused illness, and volcanoes were angry gods...
...and that the tooth fairy was an actual fairy, not a tiny dentist with boundary issues.
Folks around here think that makes me a buzzkill. But isn't science so much more exciting than magic?
Gold. Symbol: Au. Atomic number: 79.
It's soft-ish. Inert-esque. A great conductor...
...and some people spend their whole lives chasing it.
It pays for my beakers and keeps the lights on, but there are more interesting elements out there to study.
Chemistry is EVERYTHING.
Chemistry lets us combine elements in endless permutations to make something new.
Everything on the Island, good or bad, exists because of chemistry.
Who wouldn't want to master something like that?
Don't start any caustic reactions.
I've got chemical concoctions for all of your robbing-and-stealing needs.
Don't start any caustic reactions.
What's brewing?
It's not magic. It's chemistry.
You are a scientific marvel.
Nobody helps anybody for free around here. What's your angle?
Any luck on fixing that heating element for my sample incubator?

shortDescription: Don't make him tell you twice.

dialogues.message: You've got questions, I've got redacted answers.
Oh, that place is NOT safe.
If you're headed that way, I can provide backup and muscle.
For a price. Heh.
Everyone thinks they've got the boss pinned down. Understood. Dead to rights.
They never do.
Midas is a complicated, *motivated* person.
But he's always been good to me. And in my mind, he's always been justified to do what he does.
Neither. My allegiance was always to the boss.
I go where he goes. I do what he needs done.
Midas has been good to me over the years. He'll have my loyalty for a lifetime.
You look like you need somethin'.
You look surprised to see me.
You look like you need somethin'.
You got a message from the Boss?
Where Midas goes, I follow.
Boss. Good to have ya back.
Good to see ya, Big Cat.

shortDescription: A fearsome demon warrior, bound by ancient duty.

dialogues.message: I'm free. It's been so long, I don't know what to do with myself.
I can't believe it. I am free of the puppeteer's control.
I'm free. It's been so long, I don't know what to do with myself.
Freedom is... disorienting. But it's worth it.
A great darkness is building... though no-one will listen.
The Spirit Realm knows your taste now. Be careful.
I know you want my help... but I need some time.
I'm glad to see you've been rescued. This Island seems to love you.
I will never be bound against my will again.
What do you want?
There is a growing darkness at the heart of this Island.
Of course, no-one will listen to a demon. A former enemy.
Dark days are coming. I just hope this Island is ready.
I have my freedom, after centuries of bondage.
But... nobody wants to trust a demon, do they? It's... lonely.
I want to build a life, do something meaningful...
But that will take time. And at least, now, I have that.

shortDescription: If you can't take the heat, stay outta the wasabi.

dialogues.message: What do you need from sashi-me?
Making sushi is a delicate culinary art.
You have to have the best ingredients and most precise preparation.
You know what they say: There's nowhere to hide on the sushi plate!
Munch on my masterful maki.
My rolls are Durrr-licious!
Munch on my masterful maki.
Fresh cut fish on rice. What could be better than that?!
Don't be afraid, little fish! It impacts your deliciousness.
I'd be willing to franchise, if you're interested.
Gila has thunder rolls. I have lightning rolls. They're completely different products!

shortDescription: Iconic renegade on a mission for retribution.

dialogues.message: Cat's outta the bag. Hope and I are hunting a Zero Point Shard.
I'm getting too old for this mess.
Cat's outta the bag. Hope and I are hunting a Zero Point Shard.
I'm not afraid of much, but a Zero Point Shard in the wrong hands... Yeesh.
These outlaws are so... rowdy. Hmph.
Keep your eyes peeled and your guns close.
There's got to be a way to get into that demon world... place.
Been a minute, golden king. What're you scheming?
I thought we could be friends... but I think being enemies would be more fun.
If Hope gets hurt on your watch, sword boy, you'll learn what my name means.
What d'you want?
Hope's trying to figure out who she wants to be.
The luxury of peacetime, I guess. A luxury we won't have forever.
Hope's not some flashy hero type, at heart.
Hope's a leader. And a good leader's worth a hundred heroes.
Truth is, we're here hunting for a Zero Point Shard.
It's powerful. Chaotic. And prone to being misused by villain types.
I've got a lot of experience with the Zero Point, but this is a mess.
The worst part: I don't think this Shard's the only one out there...
Howdy, gearhead.
Us gearheads have one rule: don't cause trouble in the shop.
Howdy, gearhead.
Tech and gear, available here! Ugh, that rhymed.
Welcome back.
You promised you'd stay safe out there, Cass.
I don't have the parts to service your car. Sorry.
You've got an angle... don't you?
I know just about everybody around here.
You love bikes too?! I swear, I was put on this Island to build 'em and ride 'em.
Cassidy and I used to... "borrow" bikes together all the time.
I've gone legit... mostly.
But if Cass and I hadn't boosted bikes as kids, who knows what I'd be doing now!
In a place like this, with Kane's thumb pressin' down on all of us...
...I think of our markets as a community good.
Even outlaws need a place to congregate, kick back, and network, you know?
And the more Bars I make, the more bikes I can build. It's a win-win.
Cassidy's my girl! We grew up together.
She's a thrillseeker. I'm a worrier. What else can I say?
Oh! I guess I could say: if you mess with her...
...we're going to have a serious, serious problem. Got it?
Magic can be good or bad, but it's always wild.
Keep an eye out for the sprites. They like to play.
Magic can be good or bad, but it's always wild.
I survived the Spirit Realm and I didn't even get a cool t-shirt.
I think I need a break from adventures for a bit.
This Island is beautiful, and it's my destiny to protect it.
I can feel this deep, magical connection to the sprites and the Island. It's amazing.
I'm worried about Daigo. Wherever he is...
I'm worried about you, Daigo. Please... just come home.
However I can help your quest, I'm happy to.
Trust me. Magic is real... and dangerous.
You think you own your wealth... but I think it owns you.
I'll try to help, however I can.
I can't explain my connection to the sprites in words, exactly.
I can understand them. I can feel what they feel. They listen to me.
And... I can feel this great, slow heartbeat in my chest, alongside my own.
I think it's the heartbeat of the Island itself.
I'm worried about Daigo. He's obsessed with the darkness he saw in the Spirit Realm.
He thinks he alone can face it. He's wrong.
If he tries to face the heart of the darkness alone, he will lose. It will take him.
We have to stop him. But I don't know if we can.
The Spirit Realm‚Ä¶ I can barely remember my time there, but it was strange.
The Spirit Realm wasn‚Äôt dark, or evil‚Ä¶ but there was a dark presence there.
It knew me. My family's bloodline. And it wants us, all of us... but especially Daigo.
It has the Shard. We can‚Äôt let it take the Island.

shortDescription: Keep far away from Maki Master.

dialogues.message: (Fishstick cocks his head in confusion.)
(Fishstick waves and burbles kindly.)
(Fishstick cocks his head in confusion.)
(Fishstick gives a little wave.)
(Fishstick burbles excitedly.)
(Fishstick's eyes widen in alarm.)
(Fishstick glares with angry intent.)
(Fishstick gives you his full attention.)
(Fishstick mimes a train moving, and then happily walking on.)
(Fishstick mimes a WHOLE LOT OF CHAOS and running off the train in a panic.)
(Fishstick droops dramatically at not being able to get onto the train.)
(Why did he want to get on the train? He mimes cutting sushi and scowls: REVENGE on Durrr Taisho!)
If you're here to get in my way... don't.
If you're here to get in my way... don't.
Just... stay out of my way. For Jade's sake.
Hm. I don't know you... and I know everyone.
Stay out of my business, stranger, and I'll stay out of yours.
What would you like to know?
People cannot cross into the Spirit Realm. Only demons.
I'll admit, I have a burning curiosity to see that world.
What ancient secrets it may be keeping...
But even I can't cross the threshold. Yet.
Kendo styles himself as a warrior of old, but he's just restless and bored.
He seeks some great purpose... Fool. We make our own purpose.
Jade is reckless, but brilliant. Maybe the smartest person I've met, aside from myself.
She'll change this world, if she doesn't destroy herself in the process.
As the eldest son, I inherited the shop from my grandfather.
Once upon a time, we made great, magical Masks of Power.
But my ancestors burned the secrets to crafting them.
I've unlocked rudimentary mask magic, but if I could make a true Mask of Power...
